comments.text:
The icon in the bottom left corner is not as useful as it used to since we sync messages offline reading by default now, making the dialog you get by pressing it a odd extra step.
The button is also easy to hit by mistake.

I suggest we remove it from the default UI, I'm happy with keeping the action in the menus.
comments.creator: bugs@andreasn.se
